CheckTitle: Ensure meeting chat does not allow anonymous users
Description: Ensure meeting chat does not allow anonymous users.
Risk: Allowing anonymous users to participate in meeting chat can expose sensitive information and increase the risk of inappropriate content being shared by unverified participants.

Code.Other: 1. Navigate to Microsoft Teams admin center https://admin.teams.microsoft.com. 2. Click to expand Meetings select Meeting policies. 3. Click Global (Org-wide default). 4. Under meeting engagement verify that Meeting chat is set to On for everyone but anonymous users.

Recommendation.Text: Restrict chat access during meetings to only authenticated and authorized users. Disable chat capabilities for anonymous users to maintain confidentiality and prevent misuse.
